entry.value: // Your custom imports:%%00010import com.icegreen.greenmail.configuration.GreenMailConfiguration;%%00010import com.icegreen.greenmail.imap.ImapServer;%%00010import com.icegreen.greenmail.util.GreenMail;%%00010import com.icegreen.greenmail.util.ServerSetup;%%00010import jakarta.mail.Folder;%%00010import jakarta.mail.MessagingException;%%00010import jakarta.mail.Store;%%00010import jakarta.mail.Session;%%00010

// Your custom variables:%%00010/** First email user. */%%00010 public static final String USER1 = "knime-1@localhost";%%00010%%00010 /** First email user password. */%%00010 public static final String PWD1 = "knime1234";%%00010%%00010 /** Second email user. */%%00010 public static final String USER2 = "knime-2@localhost";%%00010%%00010 /** Second email login. */%%00010 public static final String PWD2 = "knime1234";%%00010%%00010 /** Second email user. */%%00010 public static final String USER3 = "knime-3@localhost";%%00010%%00010 /** Second email login. */%%00010 public static final String PWD3 = "knime1234";%%00010%%00010 /** {@link GreenMailConfiguration} with the two test users. */%%00010 public static final GreenMailConfiguration CONFIG =%%00010 new GreenMailConfiguration().withUser(USER1, PWD1).withUser(USER2, PWD2).withUser(USER3, PWD3);%%00010%%00010 /** {@link ServerSetup} for SMTP and IMAP tests. */%%00010 public static final ServerSetup[] SETUP = new ServerSetup[]{ServerSetup.SMTP.dynamicPort().setVerbose(true),%%00010 ServerSetup.IMAP.dynamicPort().setVerbose(true)};%%00010%%00009%%00010%%00009%%00010 public static Folder createFolder(final Store store, final String name) throws MessagingException {%%00010 final Folder someFolder = store.getFolder(name);%%00010 if (!someFolder.exists()) {%%00010 if (someFolder.create(Folder.HOLDS_MESSAGES | Folder.HOLDS_FOLDERS)) {%%00010 someFolder.setSubscribed(true);%%00010 }%%00010 }%%00010 return someFolder;%%00010 }%%00010

%%00009final Thread t = Thread.currentThread();%%00010%%00009final ClassLoader orig = t.getContextClassLoader();%%00010%%00009//use the ClassLoader of the Session.class from the email libs project which contains the meta_inf with the%%00010%%00009//service definitions%%00010%%00009t.setContextClassLoader(Session.class.getClassLoader());%%00010%%00009try {%%00010%%00009%%00009GreenMail m_mail = new GreenMail(SETUP);%%00010%%00009%%00009m_mail.withConfiguration(CONFIG);%%00010%%00009%%00009m_mail.start();%%00010%%00009%%00009final ImapServer imap = m_mail.getImap();%%00010%%00009%%00009final ServerSetup serverSetup = imap.getServerSetup();%%00010%%00009%%00009out_serverAddress = serverSetup.getBindAddress();%%00010%%00009%%00009out_serverImapPort = serverSetup.getPort();%%00010%%00009%%00009final var smtp = m_mail.getSmtp();%%00010%%00009%%00009out_serverSmtpPort = smtp.getPort();%%00010%%00009%%00009out_user1 = USER1;%%00010%%00009%%00009out_user1_pwd = PWD1;%%00010%%00009%%00009out_user2 = USER2;%%00010%%00009%%00009out_user2Pwd = PWD2;%%00010%%00009%%00009out_user3 = USER3;%%00010%%00009%%00009out_user3Pwd = PWD3;%%00010%%00009%%00010%%00009%%00009//create folder%%00010%%00009%%00009out_mailFolder = "MyFolder";%%00010%%00009%%00009final Store store = m_mail.getImap().createSession().getStore();%%00010%%00009 store.connect(USER2, PWD2);%%00010%%00009 createFolder(store, out_mailFolder);%%00010%%00009 createFolder(store, "Reports");%%00010%%00009 createFolder(store, "Meeting Recaps");%%00010%%00009 createFolder(store, "Quarter Results");%%00010%%00009} catch (Exception e) {%%00010%%00009%%00009throw new Abort(e);%%00010%%00009} finally {%%00010%%00009%%00009t.setContextClassLoader(orig);%%00010 }%%00010%%00009%%00010%%00010%%00010%%00010
